item.title: Desi Beats
item.description:
Project Overview

Genre: Rhythm-Based Music Game
Platform: Mobile (Android)
Technologies Used: Unity, C#, Audio Synchronization, Mobile Optimization
Play Store Link

Description

Contributed to the development of Desi Beats, a rhythm-based mobile game by Hungama Game Studio. Focused on gameplay research and mechanics refinement to enhance player interaction with Indian music tracks.

Key Features

  • Rhythm-Based Gameplay: Designed engaging tap and bounce mechanics synchronized with Indian music tracks for an immersive experience.
  • Music Synchronization: Worked on precise beat-matching logic to ensure seamless gameplay.
  • Performance Optimization: Suggested optimizations for smooth performance across various mobile devices.
  • User Interaction Enhancements: Assisted in refining UI elements and touch responsiveness for better player feedback.
  • Collaboration: Worked with the team to improve core gameplay mechanics and overall user experience.

What I Learned

  • Gained experience in designing and refining rhythm-based gameplay mechanics.
  • Learned how to optimize mobile game performance while maintaining high responsiveness.
  • Improved skills in music synchronization and user interaction design.
  • Enhanced understanding of how to create an engaging audio-visual experience in mobile games.
